nodes.bodyText: Is this to avoid timeout errors?
yes. disabled timeout for this call. test timeout is capped at 4 min "testTimeout": 240000,. so that the waiting is not forever.

Another way to do this to avoid redundant code would be just to pass the action to ellipsisMenu this.selectAction, that way for any new action you do not have to add a new switch case and a method entry in ellipsisMenu
same here we can just pass the action and call this.selectAction
Can you change it to LABLE_ALIAS?
